summary: adds a cooldown of 24 hours to the ore transmute spell
descriptionHtml:
Version 1.0
- added a cooldown of 24 hours to the transmute spell
- if you try to use it anyway it will fail

DESCRIPTION
In Vanilla you are able to transmutate all your iron ore to silver (and gold). This is overpowered in my eyes because it is no longer important to search for silver and gold.

With this mod you can only transmute one ore per day. 

My Mods:
Hardcore Lockpicking - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7395
author: Vortexio2
